comments:
Found in Hyades 3.0 20040204_1437 driver AND in the Hyades 1.2 GA driver.

Steps to reproduce:
-------------------
1. Start Eclipse from a new workspace.
2. Window -> Show View -> Other...
3. Expand "Generic Log Adapter", and select "Template Log". Click OK.

The view does not open. An exception is also thrown (see stack trace below).

However, the following sequence of steps will NOT cause this problem to occur:
1. Start Eclipse from a new workspace.
2. Open the "Generic Log Adapter" perspective.
3. Close the Template Log view.
4. Exit, then restart Eclipse.
5. Open the Template Log view.
